name: Shieldy's Basics In Being A Great Shield
name_original: Shieldy's Basics In Being A Great Shield
description:
Welcome to Shieldy's basic. The place where you can learn how to be a great shield but you just come here to collect all 8 shields for your friend however. Now go and have fun with Shieldy in his game.

Note: This is the mod that used the map called "Lucky schoolhouse" to make again. Yeah and also the map is also made by me still. Also this one has some fixed stuff from my original "Lucky schoolhouse" map such as:
-BAL_Door is now no longer overlaps
-Fixed the bug that caused you to cannot be able to use the WD-NoSquee on the Faculty door
-Fixed the bug that caused Baldi (Shieldy) ruler to become silent before his event started (For real this time.)
-Fixed the bug that you cannot be able to pick up some quarter that is spawned by Bonus time event

Credits:

Paulor94 - Map and mod creator

mystman12 - Original creator of Baldi's basic

JohnBB06 - The person who planned this mod and also made all the sprites and texture as well

Characters voiced by:

Party Hat voiced by gloo21

Controlley voiced by Gamerhogplays2

Scissors voiced by roymaster10

Chocolately voiced by CalaMaria_Plays

Pear voiced by the_ink

Boombox voiced by RobloxvsMinecraft24
